titles.title: To amend the Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands to authorize the legislature of the Virgin Islands to create municipal governments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insular Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Amends the Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands to authorize the legislature of the Virgin Islands to create units of local government in the Virgin Islands.
